title: Orin, Washington
data: Orin is an unincorporated community in Stevens County, in the U.S. state of Washington.[1] It is located on the Colville River. U.S. Route 395 passes through the community. A post office called Orin was established in 1902, and remained in operation until 1944.[2] The community has the name of Orin S. Winslow.[3] This Stevens County, Washington state location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
